channel.title: Statius Warhammer Help

item.title: Statius Warhammer Help
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

part 4 adding special attacks

difficulty
3-10

okay first open up your client.java and search for

5698 && specialAmount > 24){

this is a simple copy and paste method
now copy the whole thing itle look like this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 0x426); getHit(8); usingSpecial = true; }
add this under it (change your weapon id)

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9455 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtk(true, 25, 451, 2927); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(8); usingSpecial = true; specialAmount -= 50; }}
okay were not doen yet half way
now search for

5698 && specialAmount > 24){

youll see this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 0x426); npcDamage(8); }
now same thing for erlier just change the id of the weapon
now paste under that this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9455 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 451, 2927); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; npcDamage(8); }
okay now it has a fully working dragon dagger special attack
save, compile

were not done yet! okay now it has a special but? wheres the special bar in game
okay now heres how we add this
open your special.java
now search for [code]5698[code]
now u will see something like this

case 5698:

okay now under that put 2 tabs and add this

case 9455

okay now search for5698 again youll find something that looks the
exact same
now just do what you did above adding the

case 9455

umm just replace the 9455 with you’re item id that d claws spec works on npc, and players it work’s good >.>[/code][/code]

Read full topic

where it says specialAtk(true, 75 means special ammount used, 252 is gfx and 2068 is emotes
